issue.title: Python: Parquet: Dictionary encoding is deactivated if column-wise compression was selected
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:
Seems like a copy&paste mistake: https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/4d2ac871c9126ba431ebb193ea19bd5eb7ef8ab3/python/pyarrow/_parquet.pyx#L543
